channel.title: Why people use PI over Hyperion over Apollo over X over Y
channel.description:
Widespread support. It's like why Windows has a huge coverage of the OS market, it's easy to deploy, has all of the features people expect, and doesn't require extensive training.
Now stop asking why it's more used or why people/major RSPS aren't changing their software.

item.title: Why people use PI over Hyperion over Apollo over X over Y
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“lare69, post:5, topic:545869”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=664752.msg4443884#msg4443884 date=1407872605]

well if you think about it we kinda have advanced, I mean like 4 years ago delta was the most popular and project insanity is better than delta lol

extremely slowly and unsure-ly advancing.
[/quote]
yeah, talk about slow. java 8 is here and PI still doesn’t even use stuff from java 7[/quote]
or 6

Read full topic
